fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: A fresh, bright red apple with a crisp texture and a sweet, tangy flavor. Apples are a classic fruit, enjoyed for their versatility and nutrition. Great for snacking or adding to salads and desserts.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: Bananas are a convenient and nutritious fruit, known for their soft texture and natural sweetness. They are rich in potassium and make for a quick and easy snack on the go.

fruits.name: Grapes
fruits.description: Fresh, juicy grapes are a refreshing treat, perfect for snacking or adding to salads. Their sweet, slightly tart flavor is complemented by a smooth texture.

fruits.name: Pineapple
fruits.description: A tropical delight, pineapple offers a vibrant, tangy flavor that’s perfect in fruit salads, juices, or on its own. Its sweet yet tart taste is packed with Vitamin C and antioxidants.

fruits.name: Mango
fruits.description: A succulent and aromatic tropical fruit, mango is known for its rich, sweet taste. Whether eaten fresh or in smoothies, it’s a juicy treat full of flavor.

fruits.name: Cherry
fruits.description: These sweet cherries are a tasty bite-sized treat, perfect for snacking or adding a burst of color and flavor to desserts and salads. Juicy and flavorful, they’re an antioxidant-rich fruit.

fruits.name: Kiwi
fruits.description: Known for its vibrant green color and unique flavor, kiwi is a nutrient-dense fruit. It has a delicious balance of tartness and sweetness, making it a great addition to smoothies or fruit bowls.

fruits.name: Strawberry
fruits.description: Strawberries are a bright red fruit with a juicy, sweet flavor and a slightly tart finish. They’re perfect for adding to desserts, smoothies, or eating fresh on their own.

fruits.name: Watermelon
fruits.description: Watermelon is a hydrating, refreshing fruit with a mild sweetness. It’s perfect for hot days, enjoyed as slices or blended into drinks, and is low in calories while rich in vitamins.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: Oranges are a citrus fruit packed with Vitamin C and a refreshing, juicy taste. They can be enjoyed as a snack, in juices, or added to dishes for a tangy twist.

fruits.name: Green Apple
fruits.description: Green apples have a tart, crisp taste, making them perfect for pies, salads, or as a refreshing snack. Their unique flavor is both sweet and tangy.

fruits.name: Lychee
fruits.description: Lychees are small, juicy fruits with a sweet and floral flavor. They are often enjoyed fresh or added to drinks and desserts for a tropical touch.
